text: int main ( ) { int n ; int mat [ 100 ] [ 100 ] = { 0 } ; int max ; int i , j , k ; int rows ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( k = n ; k > 0 ; k -- ) { max = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & rows ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < rows ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & mat [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } if ( rows != 1 ) { for ( i = 1 ; i < rows ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < i ; j ++ ) if ( ! j ) { mat [ i ] [ j ] = mat [ i - 1 ] [ j ] ; } else if ( mat [ i - 1 ] [ j ] > mat [ i - j ] [ j - 1 ] ) { mat [ i ] [ j ] += mat [ i - 1 ] [ j ] ; } else { mat [ i ] [ j ] += mat [ i - 1 ] [ j - 1 ] ; } for ( j = 0 ; j < i ; j ++ ) { if ( max <= mat [ i ] [ j ] ) max = mat [ i ] [ j ] ; } } } else { max = mat [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ; } printf ( "%d \n" , max ) ; } return 0 ; }
